name: Billy Straw
text: I've gotten pizza here a few times, always been satisfying...but never really got around to leaving a review. Tried ordering a turkey club sub just to try something new along with pepperoni cheese bread just incase the sub was a flop. On …More

name: Scott Rogers
text: Always went to this spot when visiting PCB in Florida. Had to get some more. Grab the $7.99 deal! I may have had a slice on the drive home. Nom. [Update] added pictures of the cheese bread and another pizza. Hot and fresh!

name: LaTise Body Pampering LLC
text: LOVE this place!  Took a chance on them when I first moved to FL and never looked back.  Now that I'm back home in CO, I eat there on WACKY WEDNESDAYS for a discounted price!  The antipasto salad and chicken bacon ranch sub are DELISH and 2 …More

name: Paula Samet
text: Former Marco’s customer who lives in the area, but we ordered from HH last night and were very pleased. The deep dish pizza totally hit the spot! I would have liked to see a little more consistency on the toppings, but overall delicious. …More

name: David Goodlin
text: I worked at a HH 12 years ago in Texas. Was stoked to find one in CO. It's greasy. It's fatty. It's not part of a healthy diet. It's freaking delicious and everything I remembered. Cajun butter crust for the win! Eat sparingly or turn into a giant belly monster.

name: Michael Meyer
text: This location does a good job.  We have ordered from them many times and have only run into one issues, which they quickly resolved.  Good prices and good quality for a pizza chain.  We were pleasantly surprised with the size and quality of the salads as well!  I would recommend this location o Gun Club.

name: cfuller02
text: Hungry Howie’s was our favorite pizza place in the area. They were always fast and accurate. I understand that volume is higher right now and that can effect their speed, but it’s their quality and accuracy that has suffered more. Our last …More

name: Christopher Rawls
text: I had the best pepperoni pizza I've had in a long time and delivery was fast. Do yourself a favor and try the stuffed crust if you haven't. It's very delicious. Love Hungry Howie's!

name: Anantha lakshmi
text: Loved their Garlic crust pizza...completely unique but very few options for vegetarians. Loved what we bought!!

name: Marty Matheaus
text: Good pizza. The option of several flavors of crust is a nice change from plain crust. Fresh ingredients. Great bread sticks. Wings are good size and flavorful. Decent prices.

name: Isaac Hansen
text: We moved down here four months ago and found this gem!  The variety of crust options are great, the pizza is very reasonably priced, everyone in my family loves the pizza, and best of all the owner is a very nice man!  I made a mistake when …More

name: Robert Nesler
text: Tastes like something from elementary school lunch line.  Not good at all...

name: Floyd Hayes
text: This is my go to pizza spot. Consistently good and competitive pricing. I want this place to stay in business so I am leaving a rare review. The young staff is professional and serious about what they are doing.  I am always satisfied with my pizza. I'd give a 5 star but I like keeping the bar very high.

name: Dinu Madapatha
text: I wish Howie’s was close. But then I’d eat pizza everyday. Best pizza I’ve had in a long time.

name: Scott Gallagher
text: Very nice specials, good quality. Very easy ordering on line.

name: Srebrina Mincheva
text: Best calzones! Love this place!

name: Genevieve W
text: Favorite pizza place from Florida now closer to home?! This was an exciting find for our family! The staff were great and very patient with our bigger-family topping organization. Everyone loved the pizza, and the dessert pizza was a new favorite, too!

name: Gary Craig
text: Good pizza. Nice people

name: J Graves
text: Legitimately the best pizza in the US.  There is only 1 store in the Denver metro...  I have and will drive up to 25 mins for this pizza.

name: John Kaufman
text: We love Howie’s. I’ve been a customer since the 80’s when they were a little shop on Smoky Hill & Chambers. …More

name: Brian Clark
text: Howies subs are always perfect. Like another reviewer, I fell in love with the FL locations and I drive 40 miles to just eat it now. Worth the drive. Never had an issue at this store either! The food is always right, the staff are always …More

name: Shawn Hunter
text: I just tried this place last night,  the crust was great on the pizza...that is the only reason I gave it 3 stars though. The problem is they hardly put any toppings on the pizza at all... if they did I am sure it would have been great. My …More

name: erik adkins
text: Best pizza ever, we need more locations!

name: Thomas Franchi
text: Howie’s pizza is always fire... so long as you get the Cajun crust. We drive 25 minutes (which is really far seeing as how you’d be in and out of the last town I lived in after driving 20 minutes in one direction) just to get pizza here. …More

name: Karmyn LaDuke
text: This is by far the best pizza we have ever had in Colorado! Very delicious!!!

name: Charles Atkinson
text: The original flavored crust pizza. It's the only one in Colorado so if you want some delicious Midwest pizza this is it. Gave 4 stars because it is out of the way in Aurora. You have to really want it.

name: Linda Cook
text: I didn't know they existed. Good job on their part of reaching out to businesses. They reached out a full block south of them to another shopping area of which I work. I look forward to returning to Hungry Howie's.

name: Burton McLucas
text: Hungry Howie's is our go to pizza place! They make it fast and it tastes great. We love the variety of options for crusts, toppings, and sauces.

name: David Montoya
text: Great pizza, great sandwiches and great bread

name: Richard Giglio
text: Great pizza! This place is our go to for sure. Love the variety of crust flavor options but I almost always go with the onion crust.

name: Mark Brodis
text: Great pizza

name: Kim Populorum
text: Love their pizza!

name: Arely Diaz
text: Better than PizzaHut or Domino's we 💘 the sesame crust

name: Paul Steinhauser
text: The pizza is great and one of the best places absolutely if you enjoy stuffed crust. The only thing is their menu doesn't actually have pricing on it for sizes or anything really. It's hard to gauge what I want based on what's in my wallet. But solid pizza and they do delivery within 3 miles.

name: dee dee Lewis
text: This place is so good, I can't even begin to tell you how many times I've eaten here. The pizza is so cheesy and yummy and I think it's pretty cool that you get to choose your own flavored crust. I would recommend garlic flavored crust with …More

name: Bailee Goodwin
text: We used to live in PCB Florida and loved Hungry Howie’s!! When we found this one, we were beyond thrilled as we love their pizza! However, when calling to order in and arriving, the employees were a little rude which was our first …More

name: Cecilia Anne
text: I am never disappointed with the food... They are my go to for Delivery ... The food is Always warm & my Favorite place to get Wings these days!!!

name: JOSEPH C PRINCE
text: Horrible pizza. More dough. Scarce on the meat. Not very good tasting. I'd much prefer papa Murphys over this. Hungry Howies should've stayed hungry and tried someone else's pizza.

name: Joseph Mestas
text: This place is good but sadly not very efficient for a large order. Also pretty expensive.

name: Maple Eady
text: if you want great service and excellent pizza, check this out. Food is yummy and service is prompt and friendly ---even though they were packed to the gills the day we went.

name: Timothy Howey
text: Prompt service, order was ready fast, great pizza.

name: Whitney Hawk
text: Howie's delivery is also quick and Pizza shows up hot and the order is correct. Friendly service.  Good prices, check out those $5 meal deals!

name: David Jackson
text: Good pizza for a reasonable price

name: Gregory Kostelac
text: Yes, I'll drive 40 minutes one way just to pick up a hungry howies pizza. Cheap, delicious every single time, and the family's favourite pizza place.

name: Reggie Fontenot
text: I gave them a shot last night, it was awesome! The Greek Salad was great. They were also right on time...within 5 minutes of time given on ticket which was 45 minutes. Will be ordering again.

name: Cash Martyr
text: Great pizza! Wasn't expecting that to be honest lol! Will definitely be back to buy more!

name: vanessa Shelby
text: My daughter said it is the best pizza in Colorado, and she is absolutely right! Is was definitely worth the drive. I hope they get one closer to Aurora soon.

name: Lauriann Tran
text: I used to eat Hungry Howie's all the time back in my hometown in Florida. I found this Hungry Howie's in Aurora by chance, and decided to stop in. The food was really good the way that I remember it, but their staff could be a little more friendly. I couldn't give them any more than three stars for unfriendly and uncaring attitudes.

name: Devin Smith
text: Literally the worst. Wouldn't return again if you paid me to do it. Employees processing the walk in orders before the online orders placed over 30 minutes prior. Walk in and sit down folks because you will be waiting longer then those that …More

name: Tony R
text: I have been to Hungry Howies over 20 times.  I have never had a bad pizza, when I get it delivered it is always on time.  The customer service at this pizza place is awesome.  I would definitely recommend getting a pizza from here.  Haven't tried any of the desserts so I can comment on those, the breads are pretty good though as well.

name: Ashley Batty
text: Great affodable food and quick service, not a lot of dine in seating.

name: Duane Conn
text: Drove 45 minutes to get to the only Hungry Howies in Colorado, and it was WELL WORTH IT. …More

name: Courtney Machac
text: Never dissapoints with that garlic herb flavoured crust

name: Jessie miller
text: Prompt service and great pizza. You can never go wrong with hungry howies pizza. So many choices and always tastes phenomenal.

name: J Watters
text: This pizza is awful! We received a coupon for Howie's Pizza, unfortunately we used it. We place an online order. Our pizzas were supposed to arrive in approximately 45 minutes. It was double that! When they did arrive, they were luke warm. …More

name: Anya S.
text: Yummy and affordable

name: Garret Hiatt
text: Placed a deferred online order about an hour in advance and food was ready right on time, fresh and hot! Flavored crusts are the thing at Howies, I personally recommend the asiago cheese. Good pizza for a chain, decent prices, and very friendly service!

name: Bo Dicaire
text: Great deals all the time. Sign up for their emails and you get a lot for a little. Best flavored crust ive ever had

name: Kenny Martinez
text: Hungry Howies is definitely my favorite pizza joint in the world. I know there is many out there but the pizza from home is SLAMMIN!!!

name: Jessica
text:
Flavoured crusts!! Antipasto salad!
**edit** This is my favorite pizza place!!!!!  Tonight we ordered one large pizza with salad and bread sticks(online).  We always ask for ranch instead of the …More

name: Ryan Sabo
text: I ordered a pizza 1 hr and 28 min. Ago being told it would be here in 35 min. Now the place is closed and no pizza ever did show up! Not impressed!! …More

name: Rachel H
text: I have to say, this has become my FAVORITE pizza chain!  Their pizza is so delicious, and reasonably priced, and the flavored crusts are amazing.  This weekend, I bought four pizzas and a party salad from them for my son's 10th birthday …More

name: Sarah Tomase
text: The real deal. Try the garlic and cajun crusts. Howie rolls are tasty and a good value.

name: Cody Hawkins
text: Hungry Howie's is the best pizza you can get at bargin prices. Seriously i have been waiting for one of these to open for 10 years in colorado. The calzones are 6 bucks and are huge and tasty. Seriously you cant go wrong. Flavored crust forever!

name: G Naff
text: Good when it's good, but saw them backed up by 40 minutes.  Gave me a free 2-liter for my trouble.

name: Josh
text: prices are pretty fair and pizzas always good and ready quick

name: Christopher Wooten
text: 2003.    Last time I had HH.   Lived in Vegas and HH was staple from 2000--03.    Glad to find here.   Delicious as always.  Hope they expand.

name: Paul Sorokaty
text: Good pizza at a great price.

name: Lisa Grinshpan
text: Pretty good, and the server was friendly and efficient

name: Alex Hamroun
text: Great pizza, awesome crust and the best breadsticks. Keep up the good job.

name: Stephen Stern
text: I have yet to come here shout out from Tempe Arizona Howie's Why you so far out of Denver tho

name: Nathan Lane
text: So good and cheap, Joel is awesome!! Eaten there almost every day in the past 5 days one day twice.

name: Neecie Rose
text: Omg. Best. Pizza. Ever.

name: Dominick B.
text: My favorite pizza ever. Howie Maui with extra butter garlic ummmmm heaven!!!!

name: t.g.s
text: It's exactly what you'd expect from a cheap pizza. Nothing stellar but can take you from hangry to mildly satiated.

name: Christian Dragos
text: Awesomely delicious pizza.

name: jason edmonson
text: Wish there were more of them up here in Denver.

name: Karma Pauley
text: This pizza is to die for. Yum!

name: Momi Peretz
text: Good Piza

name: M J
text: So good.

name: Gregory Wenthe
text: Fresh and hot and cheeeeeessssyyyy

name: Angie Carmichael
text: Not as good as down at home in Florida.

name: Ronald Jean
text: Clean establishment and prepared with care.

name: Heather Sack
text: Stuff crust 😛❤️

name: Jon Siers
text: Love the 3 cheese Howie bread.

name: Le-Anne Lewis
text: Pizza was very tasty and nice and hot

name: cameron treadwell
text: Apparently directions is a foreign word they do not understand.

name: Teneka Rodriguez
text: Great Sandwiches

name: Chilli Moreno
text:
Order some pizza to go with your SALT..
And Asian Wings are  even worse YUCK..

name: Jermaine Williams
text: Good pizza fast

name: Atif Dawood
text: Crust on their pizzas is out of this world.

name: Jeff Whitfield
text: Awesome pizza and sandwiches.

name: Tanya Estep
text: Best pizza around

name: Brenton Hicks
text: Great Pizza

name: James Korotko
text: Absolutely the best.
